title: Anthony T. Occhipinti Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Anthony T. Occhipinti? Check out all of Anthony T. Occhipinti's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogAnthony T. Occhipinti Senior Analyst Anthony T. Occhipinti Anthony joined Similarweb in January 2022. He has an asset management and finance background specializing in portfolio/data analytics and equity research. Anthony is a Kansas City native and an avid KC Chiefs fan. He also enjoys playing golf, traveling, cooking (recently learned how to make pasta from scratch) and spending time with family. He lives in New Jersey with his wife Renita, his children Alex, Caroline and Serena as well as his dog Enzo. Show more Insights LIV’in La Vida Golfa: LIV Golf vs the PGA Tour by Anthony T.
